name: GLKSkyboxEffect
desc: A simple skybox visual effect for use in shader-based OpenGL rendering.

items.name: var label: String?
items.desc: A string used to name your effect.

items.name: var textureCubeMap: GLKEffectPropertyTexture
items.desc: The texture to apply to the skybox.

items.name: var transform: GLKEffectPropertyTransform
items.desc: The transform applied before drawing the skybox.
